messages.content: What does the ComfyUI-Tensor-Operations repo contain?
The ComfyUI-Tensor-Operations repo contains nodes for ComfyUI that implement helpful operations on tensors, such as normalization.
What updates were made on February 2nd, 2024, in the context of ComfyUI-Tensor-Operations?
On February 2nd, 2024, the initial release of the ComfyUI-Tensor-Operations nodes was made, which included the 'Image Match Normalize' and 'Latent Match Normalize' nodes.
What does the Image Match Normalize node do?

The Image Match Normalize node returns a normalized version of the target image using the mean and standard deviation of each color channel of the source image, to match the color and brightness of the image to another.
How does the Latent Match Normalize node differ from the Image Match Normalize node?

The Latent Match Normalize node returns a normalized version of the target latent using the mean and standard deviation of each channel of the source latent. It is designed to normalize an image's latent representation, which can result in a better coloring that is closer to the coloring of the source, as latents encode color information differently than images.
